item.description:
Just bumped this to Sunday the 19th due to Earthfest on Saturday.

You may have played Softball, but have you played 16" softball? Whether you're a recreational player or serious about the game, we've got it here for you. This is a great way to get outside and enjoy good times with good friends all while staying active. We'll bring the balls and a few bats, you bring a baseball glove! Game-on with at least 12 RSVP's (cross posted so will likely have enough).

Here's the game plan:

  • 12:00 - Meet at the park (TBA)
  • 12:15 - Overview of the rules, safety, etc - then divide into teams
  • 12:30- Play!!!!!!
  • 2:00 - Conclude the meetup with snacks and socializing

Suggestions:

  • Dress for the weather
  • Bring a baseball glove and any extra to share
  • Bring a white and a dark-colored t-shirt
  • Arrive on time to be guaranteed a spot in a game
  • RSVP is recommended so you can be notified if the game is cancelled
  • Bring WATER!

We will supply the balls and bats. Contact Jessica if you have any questions.

We'll see YOU on the field!

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Sweet Sixteen Singles Softball Game - Coed & All Levels Welcome!
